title: Ticket #143: CondorPersonal.pm: StartCondor should take paramfile directly
description: /src/condor_scripts/CondorPersonal.pm contains CondorPersonal::StartCondor (roughly line 224). Option 2 is "paramfile" the path to a file containing configuration information. For the simple case, having this information in a separate file is overkill versus embedding it in my test.run. It would be nice to be able to pass in the contents of the file directly, eliminating the need for the separate file.
creator: adesmet
